website_summaries.verdict: Two well-made, hand-crafted vases for one price makes this duo an excellent value. A good  choice for gifting a loved one and treating yourself, all with one purchase.
pros: A pair of vases that are handmade of quality ceramic that feels strong and stable
Minimalist designs pair well with most decor and complement all types of flowers and greenery
cons: One vase has a twine accent that may not appeal to all customers, but fortunately it's easy to remove

customer_reviews.title: Minimalistic & Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I love them! They add a really nice elegant vibe to the space and I will soon get similar vases for the other plants too!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Stylish vases
customer_reviews.text: I love these vases. Very stylish and versatile. The rope wasn’t really my taste, so I just cut it off. Looks even more stylish and beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: AnnaBanana

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and neutral decoration
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, nice looking with single bamboo plant in it. Can't really put really flower/water in it as far as I can tell though. Best to use for fake plants.
customer_reviews.author: WN

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Simple and stylish. I filled them with water and use them as vases. They look classy without being expensive or extravagant. I love the mat white color that really lets the green leaves of my plant pop.
customer_reviews.author: C. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Modern, classy vases, look great with simple branch of magnolia
customer_reviews.text: Love the texture and form of this set. The rope is a perfect touch. Just be careful, the material is very fragile and will easily break.
customer_reviews.author: Linda F.

customer_reviews.title: Petite vases
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and the quality seemed good. I read the size description but thought they would be okay in the space but I was wrong. They were too small for my decorating need so returned.
customer_reviews.author: Mykidsmom

customer_reviews.title: Rope design
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Great quality packaging and product. I cant wait to use them!
customer_reviews.author: alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to my tv console! Love the feel of the vases as well. Sturdy but light weight. Nice clean white finish.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice - a bit smaller than hoped
customer_reviews.text: So, yes we saw the size. We just hoped they were a smidge larger/wider. They are however very nice. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Perfect the color the size everything about it is just like it shows on photo
customer_reviews.author: Reyna Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Elegant vase
customer_reviews.text: i absolute love these two vase. they came in a nice foam wrapped package and they just look simply elegant and match with any home decoration style. I dried my roses and put them in, they look so good!
customer_reviews.author: Qi Huang

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Perfect addition to my mantle. Buy the fake lavender flowers on amazon and it’s a perfect look!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: I think they’re very cute, they’re just kinda small. When I buy a bouquet from Trader Joe’s I usually need to split it between the two vases so it fits
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and delicate
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and delicate. Can't wait to use them for our wedding, and even after in our home as decoration.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Flores

customer_reviews.title: She liked both of them
customer_reviews.text: These vases are gorgeous. Got them for my daughter. She liked both of them. The one with the rope around the neck really what we wanted. They came in a beautiful box . They were shipped in time!
customer_reviews.author: DOROTHY J MIRACLE

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: These vases are beautiful, stylish and do not tip over-great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lisalala

customer_reviews.title: Quality vases for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I liked these so much I ended up buying a second set - they look very quality/high end and handcrafted, with a matte almost gritty finish that looks really great.
customer_reviews.author: roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Minimalistic/Color popping accentuating necessity
customer_reviews.text: A perfect piece of interior décor; basic, yet perfectly designed for a minimalistic look of a high end expensive piece or a vessel for a color popping accent to any type of room or environment. I am 101% glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Allebach

customer_reviews.title: Very Modern and Clean Looking
customer_reviews.text: These vases look great. They are the perfect height and are exactly what I needed. I put some cotton stems in them for decoration and they instantly upgraded my space. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: shercali

customer_reviews.title: I really love these cars
customer_reviews.text: I really love these cars! They’re exactly what I was looking for. Something cute and simple. I added the picture andt they look a little yellow because of the lighting, but they are a pure white.
customer_reviews.author: ang Heck

customer_reviews.title: Love ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Cute! I put my bamboo plants in them and I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Hays

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size & quality
customer_reviews.text: These are very chic, modern & have the perfect size
customer_reviews.author: Naz

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact that it comes as a pair
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a gift for my wife and they are more lovely in person. I like the fact that it comes as a pair. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Smith Saintil

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my purchase. Look exactly as pictured. Nice quality. Came packaged so well that any damage was almost impossible. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: A clean and attractive design to hold my flower arrangements.
customer_reviews.text: These are great vases and I would recommend them. Good for smaller areas or large areas together and very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M Mosca

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and beautiful decor!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product as a decor. It’s sturdy, looks clean and beautiful on my coffee table.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This vase is the perfect size for a smaller bouquet. It looks wonderful in my apartment. Exactly what i was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Allison Doran

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: I have a small kitchen table and these 2 vases make the perfect centerpiece. Very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Krenik

customer_reviews.title: Very cute- just like picture
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute! I love them and they look exactly like the picture. The only thing I do wish is that there was the option to only get one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Stowell

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL MATTE FINISH!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Lovely Vases. Well Packaged. I bought 2 more sets for Christmas Gifts. Very Nice.

customer_reviews.title: Cute , simple and tidy vase

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Decent design, firm and steady. But its surface is too rough

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought the vase for my floral lunar new year decoration. The size was perfect and its packaging is very sturdy, i will keep the box to put the vase away when not using it.
customer_reviews.author: Minh Tong

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: They look pretty great with different bunches of flowers, and they are light.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful vases and great packaging!
customer_reviews.text: Love these vases! Package was very great too so the vases arrived in great condition.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous great quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful good quality just what I wanted and hoped for!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Adam Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Good quality vases for a great price. They look exactly like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Nidhi

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love these two vases, really classic and pretty, simple style but neat
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great for minimalist home decor
customer_reviews.text: Really love the material of the products. It meets my expectation and thus I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Linxh24

customer_reviews.title: Mostly 5/5
customer_reviews.text: I gave this item 4/5 because although it's lightweight and good for the cost of it, I expected the vases to have some sort of sheen on the outside. Instead, it's purely ceramic without any glossy outside, which I would expect to hide any scratches or blemishes better. Nevertheless, great product and quality.
customer_reviews.author: M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully designed. These ceramic Vases are a stylish addition ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully designed. These ceramic Vases are a stylish addition on my dinning area table They are gentle so keep in mind not to place heavy flowers in.. I just kept them like that without flowers and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: DANA SHAUL

customer_reviews.title: I just wish the texture was different
customer_reviews.text: I have a strange personal issue that does not allow me to touch things such as sandpaper, 3-D graphics, and other scratchy surfaces without feeling nauseous. The surface of this was a bit rough and sandy so I just wish it was polished or smoother. Either way, I won't fault it for MY OWN personal problems so 4 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Beachy Look!
customer_reviews.text: I really LOVE these vases. The rope border on the taller vase and the matte white finish gives them the perfect look I wanted for our beach house. They look great with dried flowers and, although I haven't put cut flowers in them yet, I understand they are water proof so I could add water and cut flowers or bamboo stalks if I wanted to later on.
customer_reviews.author: Dusguicheon

customer_reviews.title: Very classy vases
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I was looking for! I did need to put some weight at the bottom of the taller base to offset the weight of the taller flowers I put in it
customer_reviews.author: Foster

customer_reviews.title: These are very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They are very elegant and very sturdy! Not large vases; so, if your are looking for a large item(s) these are not. However, the largest vase will hold tall flowers as the vase is tall enough (look at measurements).
customer_reviews.author: JusJudy

customer_reviews.title: beautiful vases
customer_reviews.text: It was very beautiful and matched the dried flowers I bought. The material of vase was great. I was impressed by how they packaged the vases. It was fully protected. I'd recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Debz H

customer_reviews.title: The vases are beautifully balanced, simple with clean lines
customer_reviews.text: The vases are beautifully balanced, simple with clean lines. Good quality vases and they look great with flowers or standing empty.
customer_reviews.author: P Pang

customer_reviews.title: Great style
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Very sturdy and fit in with my farmhouse style.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: They are a great gift for the cost.
customer_reviews.text: These are a gift for a friend and it was a nice surprise to see how nicely they are packed to give an attractive presentation. The vases will fit into most decors with a simple clean design.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous set. I only wish the vases were taller, but am very happy with them. They arrived in perfect condition, very well packaged.

customer_reviews.title: Love the look of these vases
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of these vases. They are super cute and I'm excited to continue to fin ways to use them.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect vases!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful and exactly what we were looking for. Looks identical to the photos- true to size.

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: So nice looking! I just wish I could have just bought the vase with the rope around it instead of it being in a set of 2.

customer_reviews.title: Simple and elegant
customer_reviews.text: These are really pretty and add a nice, simple style as a centerpiece. Looked a little smaller than I thought at first but fit my bouquet well and looks nice!

customer_reviews.title: Even better than the picture.
customer_reviews.text: I gave these as a gift, and didn't get to see them until the present was opened. What a relief when they proved to be lovely!

customer_reviews.title: Very cute

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, elegant and simple.  Exactly as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful décor for any room, I used these to put a little touch on the top of our kitchen cabinets. Love the details of the twine too.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for work desk
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute. I'm only using one at the moment for my work desk. Not too big and not too small.

customer_reviews.title: Charming
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with the quality. It's very minimalist and pretty.

customer_reviews.title: Looks elegant!!
customer_reviews.text: They look so good with my 2 ladies in white, these vases are beautiful and was package very well!!

customer_reviews.title: I like the presentation
customer_reviews.text: The bouquet sits well. Since its not transparent, the flower's lower tip is hidden. Useful for flower replicas

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: These are very elegant and I love them. The packaging for shipping is also excellent.

customer_reviews.title: I love the finish and design
customer_reviews.text: These are the most gorgeous vases. I love the finish and design.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!

customer_reviews.text: I like the design so simple and pretty and like material they are made from . So nice set

customer_reviews.title: Simply elegant
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely stunning vases! Exceptional quality and packaging. Simply elegant! Fit any decor. Mine compliment our minimalistic style perfectly.

product_meta.title: Opps White Ceramic Vases with differing Unique Rope Design for Home Décor – Set of 2
product_meta.description:
Size:Rope Design-Still don’t know how to decorate your office or home? 
-Still confuse what gifts can delight your family, friends or lovers? 
-Come and see it! 
-OPPS Unique White Ceramic Vases can be your PERFECT CHOICE! 

Color: White

PACKAGE CONTENT: 
1 X OPPS White Ceramic Vases (With Rope Design) 
1 X OPPS White Ceramic Vases (Without Rope Design) 
***Plants not included.*** 

VASE SIZE: 
White Vase: 7.6”H, 3”D; 
Rope Vase: 9.6”H, 2.8”D; 

We do provide 100% OPPS Satisfaction Guarantee and back up with 60 days warranty (defection, accidental damage, non-satisfaction), so don’t worry about the problem of transport damage. 
If you are still have any questions, please contact me in time! 
We cannot guarantee this sale price for long - Be Sure To Click “Add to Cart” Now!
feature_bullets: UNIQUE DESIGN: Thanks to the simply and elegant design, these 2 ceramic vases can provide your interior space fresh and clean feeling. Then unlike other bright white vases, these items have special frosted handfeel, which can improve the owner’s elegance better. *Plants not included.*

HANDMADE HIGH QUALITY: OPPS ceramic vases are manufactured though an appropriate synergy between traditional handmade technologies and ergonomics. From the bottleneck to the bottom, these items display beautiful and natural line. Meanwhile, they are made from advanced pottery clay and straw rope so that the vases have a good ability of corrosion resistance. (White Vase: 7.6”H, 3”D; Rope Vase: 9.6”H, 2.8”D )

EXTENSIVE USES: Hollow interior allows you to fill these vases with different fillers such as dried or silk flowers, branches, wheat, pearls, pebbles and etc. PERFECT for office or home décor, dinner parties, holidays, wedding planning and other special occasions.
BEST GIFT: These ceramic vases are packaged safely and beautifully so that they can be the best gift to your family or friends who likes to decorate his/her house!
60 DAYS WARRANTY: 100% OPPS Satisfaction Guarantee. We back up with 60 days warranty (defection, accidental damage, non-satisfaction).
